resource_requirements: batch queueing system (PBS, SLURM, SGE, MOAB, etc.)
description: This script is a MOSSCO startup script that facilitates compiling and running MOSSCO coupled system simulations. It provides options for configuring various aspects of the simulation, including the number of processors, the queuing system, the log level, and the simulation title. The script handles the necessary environment setup, compilation, and job submission based on the user's choices.
